title: Life's Journey: Exploring Relationships, Resolving Conflicts
features: Thought-provoking questions and answers, expert advice, and the opportunity for readers to do some homework are the hallmarks of this guide, which is based on the premise that individuals, as active participants in their lives, can engender change and become the people they’d like to be. Among the topics discussed in this comprehensive manual are managing stress, communicating effectively, proactive parenting, eating disorders, dealing with anger, coping with depression, trauma recovery, facing fear, internet addiction, and the loss of a loved one. As they absorb the lessons included in this book, readers will gain a greater understanding of how they choices they make have a tremendous impact on how successful and self-fulfilled they are.
description: Dr. Batya Ludman's sage, cogent, kind and sane psychological outlook/interventions permeate her book: Life's Journey: Exploring Relationships, Resolving Conflicts. Written in a style that is beckoning, readable and erudite, I highly recommend this book to both laymen and therapists. --Dr. Judith Guedalia, Director of the Neuropsychology Unit and Chief Psychologist at Shaare Zedek Medical Center, Jerusalem
